snippet: Congolese rebels and government officials prepared on Thursday for their first face-to-face encounter since the rebels relinquished Goma, one of Congo’s principal cities.
lead_paragraph: Congolese rebels and government officials prepared on Thursday for their first face-to-face encounter since the rebels relinquished Goma, one of Congo’s principal cities.

headline.seo: Congo Peace Talks Set to Open in Uganda
headline.main: Congo Peace Talks Set to Open in Uganda
headline.print_headline: Congo Peace Talks Set to Open in Uganda
